name: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption
desc: A set of interfaces used to set the language option for the now-playing item.

items.name: init(type: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType, languageTag: String, characteristics: [String]?, displayName: String, identifier: String)
var displayName: String?
items.desc: The display name for a language option.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier for the language option.

items.name: var languageOptionCharacteristics: [String]?
items.desc: The characteristics that describe the content of the language option.

items.name: var languageTag: String?
items.desc: The abbreviated language code for the language option.

items.name: enum MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType
items.desc: The language option type used for the now playing item.

items.name: func isAutomaticAudibleLanguageOption() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that determines whether to use the best audible language option based on the system preferences.

items.name: func isAutomaticLegibleLanguageOption() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that determines whether to use the best legible language option based on the system preferences.
